description: React component for a user Settings page, managing user preferences such as theme, notifications, and privacy settings with persistence via external services.

methods.name: Settings()
methods.description: Main React functional component that renders and manages the user settings interface.

methods.name: showSavedBanner
methods.description: Displays a temporary banner indicating successful save operation.

methods.name: handleSave
methods.description: Saves current settings through settingsService and shows confirmation banner.

methods.name: handleReset
methods.description: Resets settings to defaults via settingsService and updates local state.

methods.name: handleToggleTheme
methods.description: Toggles between 'light' and 'dark' themes in settings.

methods.name: handleToggle
methods.description: Handles toggling boolean notification settings based on the specified path.

methods.name: handleSelect
methods.description: Updates the specified setting with a selected value, e.g., privacy options.
